author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA REMAINS A TROPICAL STORM AS IT CONTINUES WESTWARD...
summary: ...IONA REMAINS A TROPICAL STORM AS IT CONTINUES WESTWARD... As of 5:00 PM HST Wed Jul 30 the center of Iona was located near 11.8, -164.8 with movement W at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA REMAINS A TROPICAL STORM AS IT CONTINUES WESTWARD... As of 5:00 PM HST Wed Jul 30 the center of Iona was located near 11.8, -164.8 with movement W at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Iona (CP1/CP012025)
